title: Fast Lap
description: Experience the thrill of high-speed racing with a simple yet challenging touch-controlled game. Navigate a twisting track as you balance speed and control. Accelerate on straightaways, but be careful! Take curves too fast and you'll spin out. Master the art of timing to become the ultimate racer.
instructions: Tap and hold: Accelerate Release: Coast/slow down Tap and hold to speed up on straight sections. As you approach curves, release your finger to reduce speed and maintain control. Find the perfect rhythm of acceleration and coasting to achieve the fastest lap times without spinning out.

title: Blossom
description: Blossom is a fun and relaxing puzzle game. You need to connect similar flower buds until 3 or more are connected. Then, the selected flowers will blossom, and your score will increase. The variety of flowers will increase as you progress through the game, and the timer will speed up each time. Aim to reach your highest score!
instructions: Use touch or mouse to mark the flower buds

title: Mineblock Obby
description: Minecraft Obby is an amazing parkour game that you can play totally free! Do your best as you navigate through challenging obstacle courses, avoiding pitfalls and traps along the way. Collect coins scattered throughout each level to buy yourself a new sword and enhance your gameplay experience. With each jump and sprint, you'll improve your skills and push your limits. Dive into the blocky world of Minecraft Obby, avoid obstacles, collect those coins, and most importantly—have fun!
instructions: Use WASD or Arrow keys to move.

title: Farm Mahjong 3D
description: Have you ever imagined playing your favorite 3D mahjong game in a farm setting? Mahjong 3D Farm does just that! It brings the popular Mahjong 3D game into the charming world of farms, filled with adorable animals, crops, and farming tools for you to match! So why wait? Play Mahjong 3D Farm Connect now and solve the puzzle amidst the fields!
instructions: The rules of Mahjong 3D Farm are simple: find and match two tiles with the same farm-themed image. Tiles can only be matched if they’re not blocked by others. Speed is crucial, as the timer is always running! Complete levels to earn extra time, and if you need help, use the ‘Help’ and ‘Shuffle’ functions. Immerse yourself in the delightful farm setting and enjoy the challenge of matching tiles in Mahjong 3D Farm!

title: Idle Casino Manager Tycoon
description: Play Idle Casino Manager Tycoon online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

description: Play American Block Sniper Online online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Slide Them Away
description: Play Slide Them Away online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Motorcycle simulator offline
description: Get ready for an exotic stunt master & adventurous high ground city jumper sports bike simulator game.For bike racing fans and motor bike riders this exotic sports bike simulator is a real fun game. Just start your engine and hit the gas of an extreme bike to experience the stunt master thrill of high ground city jumper motorbike racing & enjoy sports bike sound.
instructions: use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Back 2 School Makeover
description: Embrace the nostalgia and dive into our Back 2 School Makeover game, where you can fashionably express yourself, experiment with stunning looks, and relish into the feeling of heading back to school with style! Embark on a fabulous journey with our character, Amelia, as she transforms from an edgy e-girl to a chic, school-ready fashionista. Revamp her entire look starting with a haircare routine and a new haircut, a complete skincare routine, and a new, school makeup.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Match Find 3D
description: Are you a master player of finding games?Do you enjoy matching puzzle games?Come to challenge this addictive puzzle game - Match Find 3D! Unique gameplay, a combination of collecting and matching, and well-designed levels that will keep you entertained.
instructions: - Tap 3 same 3D objects to eliminate them. - Sort and match objects from the screen. - Each level has a different collection target, collect the target items to pass the level. - Complete the level goals before the timer runs out. - Pay attention to the collecting bar; if fill it up, you'll fail. - Use boosters to help you solve tricky levels.

title: Tank Attack 5
description: Tank Attack 5 is an exciting game about tanks from the Second World War. Your main goal is to prepare for the boss fight. Buy new tanks and upgrade them using coins and parts collected in battle. Don't forget to repaint your tank to match the terrain you'll be fighting in! In the "Base Defense" mode, you need to wisely build tactics and distribute resources! Don't forget to improve your base!
instructions: Your main goal is to prepare for the boss fight. Buy new tanks and upgrade them using coins and parts collected in battle. Don't forget to repaint your tank to match the terrain you'll be fighting in! Controls on the desktop: A D - tank movement, W S - gun movement, Space - shooting.

title: My Little City
description: My Little City is the latest Match-3 challenge for aspiring city planners! The City Council has commissioned your company to prepare countless new building plots for construction. They need you to ensure the construction projects go according to plan! Supply building materials such as stones, water, electricity, and more! Use various boosters like sledgehammers, dynamite, or paint bombs to complete tasks on time. Play My Little City for free now and build your own Little City!
instructions: Swap two items to match three or more of the same and remove them from the board. Matching more than three will give you various powerful items to clear more tiles at once. Use matches to complete objectives and complete levels. Earn high scores to earn stars and advance to new levels.

title: Paw Clash
description: Paw Clash is an exciting party game where cute animals compete in fun challenges. Enjoy a variety of mini-games that test your skills and reflexes in colorful environments. With simple controls and increasing difficulty, Paw Clash offers endless fun for players of all ages.
instructions: Objective: Complete mini-game challenges and score the most points. Controls: Move: Arrow keys or WASD. Jump: Spacebar. Punch: Left mouse button or K key. Grab: Right mouse button or L key. Gameplay: Each mini-game has unique tasks like racing, collecting, or dodging. Complete them quickly to win. Tips: Practice controls for better results. Timing is key!

title: Majestic Dragons Merge
description: In the days of old, dragons wander the lands as the master of all. Breathe fire and plunder all the riches in Majestic Dragons! Majestic Dragons is an idle merge game where you merge together similar objects to obtain new things. Help your baby dragons grow into fearsome, majestic beasts! Watch them roam freely across the lands and accumulate riches for you. Do you know how to train a dragon? Come play now and let's find out!
instructions: Use coins to purchase a chest. Tap and drag the dragon eggs together to create a newborn dragon. Continue merging dragons of the same age to discover new dragons. Once a dragon has matured, it will start gathering coins for you as time passes.

title: The Bodyguard
description: Players will have to save the future boss. You will have to take control of a bodyguard. The bodyguard is forced to protect the boss with his body, whom they are trying to attack. The main task is to save the boss.
instructions: WASD - Moving. X - Long Jump C - Sit down Space - High jump. Right mouse button - Time dilation. The left mouse button - Strong jump. Esc - Pause.

title: Highschool Mean Girls 3
description: Play the Highschool Mean Girls 3 game and get ready to join 6 unique characters in the wild world of fashion drama in this brand-new dress-up game for girls. Test your fashion guru skills and transform high school wallflowers into show-stopping style icons. Rack up those style credits with a fabulous curated wardrobe and accessories. This dress-up game is where high school drama meets fashion week, straight from your screen. Happy playing!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Crazy 2248 Link - Matching Puzzle Game
description: 2248 is a classic number merge link matching puzzle game. The player's challenge goal is to merge the number blocks into 1024, 2048, 4096, and finally reach the infinity block!
instructions: The 2248 merging number game is simple to operate, but very challenging.The goal of these 1024,2048,4096 merge number games is to merge blocks by swiping left, right, up, or down to combine two similar numbered blocks and create a higher number. Connect the same number cubes so they merge into higher numbers.

title: Fashion World Simulator
description: It's time for some super cool styles! Be a fabulous fashionista stylist and dress up a supermodel to rule all the fashion runways around the world! Get ready to dive into the ultimate dress-up experience and show your creativity. This game is all about makeovers, dress-ups, and decorating new cool stuff. Compete and vote for your style to win the competition. Join us and start your fashion journey!
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Valley of Wolves Ambush
description: Valley Of Wolves Ambush is an action-packed survival game where waves of enemies attack your fortress. Your mission is to protect the fortress without leaving the area. Each wave brings more enemies, making the fight harder. If the enemies capture your fortress or defeat you, the game ends. Earn money by defeating enemies to buy better weapons. The most fun part? You can jump really high! Experience intense battles in a realistic war zone. Can you survive?
instructions: 1) Objective: Protect your fortress from waves of enemies. Survive as long as possible. 2) Controls: Move: Arrow keys or WASD. Jump: Spacebar (jump high!). Shoot: Left mouse button or control key. Switch Weapons: Number keys (1, 2, 3, etc.). 3) Gameplay: Waves: More enemies in each wave. Stay in the fortress and defeat them. Money: Earn money by defeating enemies to buy better weapons. 4) Win/Lose: Survive the waves. Game over if you or the fortress falls.

title: Bubble Shooter Pop
description: Get ready for a nostalgic blast from the past with Bubble Shooter Pop - Blast Fun, the ultimate classic bubble shooter game! Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant bubbles, addictive gameplay, and endless excitement.
instructions: - Addictive Gameplay - Engaging Challenges - Beautiful Graphics - Easy to Play, Hard to Master - Regular Updates

title: Candy Rain 5
description: Get ready for a delightful and vibrant match-3 experience with Candy Rain 5! The beloved Candy Rain series continues with even more sugary fun and challenging puzzles to enjoy.
instructions: The goal is simple yet incredibly satisfying: match three or more candies of the same color to clear them from the board and score points. Each successful match triggers tasty chain reactions, filling the screen with candy-crushing excitement! Combine boosters for explosive effects and watch the candy chaos unfold in a burst of colorful sweetness!

title: Hawaii Match 5
description: Escape to the paradise in Hawaii Match 5! Explore dreamlike landscapes while matching exotic fruits and flowers. With over 4000+ levels, complete challenging goals in limited moves by forming rows of five or more symbols. Unlock powerful boosters and combine symbols for explosive bonuses. Discover hidden treasures and let your soul unwind in this captivating island adventure. Play Hawaii Match 5 now and enjoy endless fun!
instructions: Match 3 or more same elements to earn stars and uncover treasures in Hawaii Match 5! Align 4 or more symbols for extra boosters and power-ups to aid your journey. Explore vibrant island scenes with Moana and enjoy endless fun. What are you waiting for? Play Hawaii Match 5 now and dive into the island excitement for free!

title: The Lost City - Match 3
description: Hit three in a row and get a crazy field explosion! Use colorful booster effects that will make the game even more fun and colorful! No stressful time restrictions! Enjoy the adventure freely! Go through a wide selection of mysterious and mystical stages. Complete various levels and get happiness from breaking gems!
instructions: The goal of the game is to complete the level before you run out of moves. The goal of each level is indicated before the start and during the passage. To break crystals, you need to make at least 3 crystals in a row. If you make more crystals, you get boosters, thanks to which you can knock down the playing field much faster and more effectively.

title: Chicken Blast
description: Tap to match chickens of the same color in this challenging match-3 game. Use powerups to score bonus points and aim for the high score. Enjoy a responsive design and endless gameplay that's easy to play but hard to master.
instructions: Match colorful chickens, use powerups, and aim for the high score in this challenging and endless match-3 game.

title: Tri Peaks Emerland Solitaire
description: Welcome to Tri Peaks Emerland Solitaire, the land of card magic! An incredible journey awaits you, in a beautiful world filled with dwarfs, elves, mermaids and many other amazing creatures. Be the hero the world needs! Welcome to Tri Peaks Emerland Solitaire, the land of card magic! An incredible journey awaits you, in a beautiful world filled with dwarfs, elves, mermaids and many other amazing creatures.
instructions: Use the left mouse button or finger to interact with in-game UI.

title: Parking Fury 3D: Night City
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-filled world of Parking Fury 3D, where you'll be at the wheel of various vehicles navigating the bustling streets of a massive city. Whether you're behind the wheel of a taxi or driving an ambulance through traffic to save lives, each mission presents its own challenges and rewards. For those who dare, there is the exciting world of car theft missions. Take on the role of a skilled driver tasked with procuring specific vehicles under the cover of darkness.
instructions: Arrow keys to drive and balance. Press CRTL to enter cars. Follow the arrows from the mini-map to the destination.

title: Sea Battle Admiral
description: Do you remember your favorite childhood entertainment with paper and pencils? Then, immerse yourself in the exciting sea battles on your device's screen. The classic paper-based tabletop naval combat game is here! Enjoy exciting naval battles, strategy, and adrenaline.
instructions: In the Sea Battle Admiral game, you arrange your ships, guess the location of the enemy fleet, and shoot for the win! Strategically place your ships on the sea grid, invisible to the enemy. Your opponent will do the same, and then players take turns shooting and trying to hit the opponent's ships. When you hit a ship, a “hit” is declared, and you can shoot again. If you miss - the turn goes to your opponent. The game goal is to be the first to sink all the opponent's ships.

title: Emoji Match
description: the emoji match includes dozens of different emojis. you can increase or decrease the number of pieces of these puzzles as you wish. so you can make it suitable for all ages. you can have a pleasant time by having fun and exercising your brain. come on we are waiting for you.
instructions: touch click sliding

title: Stellar Style Spectacle Fashion
description: Stellar Style Spectacle Fashion invites you to prep four besties for a futuristic red carpet bash. Your mission: choose attention-grabbing outfits from a virtual wardrobe of holographic gowns, metallic accessories, experiment with gravity-defying hairstyles, and glowing-in-the-dark makeup, and avant-garde accessories. Immerse yourself in a world of creativity, innovation, and stellar fashion. Ready to make a statement on the most spectacular runway of the future? let the fashion spectacle begin!
instructions: Use the left mouse click for navigation and task completion. It's worth noting that this game is compatible with both mobile and PC platforms. Enjoy the experience!

title: Color Cocktail
description: Clients are waiting for drinks from you, quickly prepare drinks for clients and collect points. Combine identical balls to get new fruits. Come on, everyone is waiting for you!
instructions: Drags the cursor at the top of the container and shoot accurately at the balls to combine identical ones. Each time you combine, the ball gets bigger and fills a glass for your guest!

title: Monster Truck Crush
description: Monster Truck Crush is a skillful balanced monster truck racing arcade game. With 3D monster trucks, you need to defeat the AI opponent by arriving at the finish line in the first place. You can speed up immediately when your vehicle is balanced on the next platform. Or else, you will lose some speed or roll the truck. The AI opponent is good at controlling the speed. But you can control the body angle of the car to keep speeding up. Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Backflip Master
description: Backflip Master is the most popular in sports' game. The main test of the player's mastery of backflips and skills. You need to backflip to reach the finished line. Of course, there will be some obstacles on the way, you must also flip over. So, are you ready to challenge this game now? Come on!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Ball Eating Simulator
description: Get ready to have a great eating and growing fun under an open sky with cool balls inside different costumes in this great simulator game! Eat as much as balls around and get as much as big in the ball’s arena. Eat others, earn coins, and unlock new skins. Chase after gifts, rotate the lucky spin, or enjoy the everyday gifts to carry your eating simulator experience further. All you want is to become the king of the ball arena with your cool player.
instructions: The game is both played single and two player. Player 1: W,A,S,D Player 2: ARROW KEYS On single player mode: Control the camera by LEFT-CLICK and MOUSE Control the camera zoom with: MOUSE SCROLL Use Joystick controls on mobile devices/tablets.

title: Real Cars Epic Stunts
description: Flashy and modified super-sports cars and their drivers are ready for the show in Real Cars Epic Stunts game. Play against time in dozens of different stunt tracks and try to complete the show. Unlock new cars or upgrade your car with the coins and diamonds you collect. Game Features: ● Realistic car physics and appearance. ( Cars get crushed and smashed ) ● Upgradeable cars ● 1 Player and 2 Player modes ● Mega ramps for epic stunts
instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Change camera view: "C" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Change camera view: "C" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "N" Change camera view: "L"

title: Road Chase. Shooter Realistic Guns
description: Shoot the enemies chasing you! Break away from the chase, your AK47 will help you with this! Huge selection of realistic weapons AK47, Minigun, Crossbow, Stationary gun, Machine gun Destroy motorcycles, ATVs, racing cars, helicopters Realistic graphics
instructions: The task of each level is to break away from the pursuit, or rather to destroy all the pursuers =) To do this, you have access to a huge arsenal. Control: Aim with the mouse Shooting occurs automatically

title: Mecha Duel
description: Crazy about robot fighting games? Wanna fight robots on the mech arena? This Mecha Duel game will not let you down. Your robot has to defeat real steel enemies in a mech arena. It’s hard to survive. Upgrade your hero to defeat war robots. Unleash fighting attacks in one-on-one robot battle with simple gameplay.
instructions: Follow in screen instructions and click on screen to do actions

title: Funny Fever Hospital
description: Join Ruby, a schoolgirl battling a unique lung virus, in Funny Fever Hospital! Diagnose, operate, and dress her for the cosplay competition. Cure her, and she'll thank you with a dazzling dress-up session! Experience medical fun and fashion in one pet-tastic game!
instructions: Use the left mouse click for medical procedures and dress-up. Compatible with both mobile and PC platforms. Enjoy the dual thrill of curing and styling!

title: Asoka Makeup Indian Bride
description: Immerse yourself in the colorful world of the Indian wedding tradition with Princesses Jacqueline and Eliza! Help them create the perfect wedding look with the help of various cosmetics and accessories. Use bright shadows, radiant blush and long-lasting lipstick to make the princesses look dazzling. Do not forget about the traditional jewelry: nath, earrings and necklace. Complete the image of an Indian bride and help the princesses become the most beautiful on the holiday!
instructions: Help two girlfriends create their own unusual version of the traditional Indian bride's outfit: apply wedding makeup; choose one of the festive hairstyles; complement the image of the bride with oriental jewelry. And, after all this pleasant fuss, welcome to the wedding photo shoot! The resulting fashionable images can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Over the Rainbow
description: Help Alex the Elf return the colors to the rainbow by jumping. Avoid enemies and find power ups to aid you in your quest.
instructions: For desktop browsers, keyboard controls for one or two players, move on diagonals only. WASD for player one, Arrow keys for player two. On touchscreen devices like iPads, Chromebooks and mobile phones, you can use touch controls in the corner of screen, or tap directly on the game board. Also works with gamepad directional sticks if available.

title: Ninja: Bamboo Assassin
description: You will be immersed in the dangerous world of ninja art, where every movement, every breath are decisive moments in your mission. Your goal is to approach your enemies unnoticed, and to achieve this, you will have to skillfully use your blade to cut through the bamboo thickets, making your way through the dense forest. But be on your guard, your enemies are not slumbering, and you can be detected at any moment.
instructions: Eliminate all enemies in the level by using bamboo thickets to do it undetected. PC controls: use the W/A/S/D buttons to control the character. Control on mobile device: tap the screen and use the joystick to control the character.

title: Sword Run 3D
description: Sword Run 3D is an easy to pick up action runner game. Collect sword pieces, cut off the obstacles that block your progress, and finally reach the finish line to win. More cool skins are waiting for you to unlock, what are you waiting for? Don't forget to share it with your friends if it's fun!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Stickman Miners Wars
description: Lead your stickman king to victory in Stickman Miners Wars, where strategic decision-making is key. Command an army of miners and warriors to build your forces and triumph over opponents. Upgrade your units and yourself as you gain experience, and strategically attack enemy castles while defending your own. Will your strategy lead you to dominance? Play Stickman Miners Wars now!
instructions: Сhoose the first region you want to reclaim on the global map and press the PLAY button. Enter the level to play as the Stickman King. To move, use the keyboard keys (arrow keys or WASD) or a joystick or mouse. Go to the miner purchase zone and buy a few miners. They will begin mining gold for you, and you can mine gold alongside them. Go to the warrior purchase zone to build your army. To send your army into attack, click the sword icon on the right or press the E key.

title: Stack Battle.io
description: It is a fun and casual puzzle. In the game, the game screen is fresh and simple, and the cute cartoon style is very eye-catching. The biggest highlight is the addition of tower defense battles to the brick-moving gameplay. The game level is very rich, and the gameplay is very simple. You can control the movement of the character by pressing and sliding on the screen. What the player has to do is to control the character to collect the bricks on the map, stack the bricks and send them to your base. When there are enough bricks, your base will be upgraded and the area will be expanded and the number of tower defenses will be increased. When the enemy enters the range of your tower defense, you will be attacked. On the contrary, when you enter the range of the enemy tower defense, you will also be attacked. whichever side is attacked and dies first will fail the game, otherwise it will succeed. Players who like brick-moving games come and download it.
instructions: The operation method of the game is very simple, you can control the movement of the character by pressing and sliding the screen with your finger

title: Roof Car Stunt
description: Challenging car game where you drive and collect coins. Jump around ramps, drive through various obstacles and drive into a giant pink donut to complete the level!
instructions: On desktop use W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to drive the car. Press R to Restart the level. On mobile use buttons on the screen to drive the car.

title: Fashionista Avatar Studio Dress Up
description: It is a fun, creative dress-up and hairstyling game for all ages. Players mix and match outfits, hairstyles, and accessories to create stylish looks. The game features cute characters, diverse clothing options, and a salon scene for designing unique hairstyles, colors, and headpieces. Enjoy endless fashion fun and creativity in a joyful, relaxed atmosphere.
instructions: Tap to choose and dress up.

title: 2248 Block Merge
description: Upon beginning to play, you will undoubtedly become hooked on these 2048 puzzle games. They are crafted with stunning visuals and user-friendly gameplay, making them an excellent option for enthusiasts of number block puzzle games.
instructions: Connect the tiles to double the number and continue as long as you can to get the highest number you get :) and enjoy the sounds you make by connecting each one.

title: Thor Merge
description: Dive into Norse mythology in Thor’s Merge! Merge planets representing the Nine Realms to create even bigger worlds. Play solo to reach the highest score or battle others in PvP mode to climb the leaderboard and achieve ultimate glory in Asgard!
instructions: Computer: -Mouse: Drag the planet left or right and click to drop. -Keyboard: Use the left and right arrow keys to move the planet and the space bar to drop it. Mobile: Drag the planet left or right with your finger and release to drop it.

title: BitGoblins RPG Simulator
description: Play BitGoblins RPG Simulator online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Vex X3M
description: VEX X3M, a new extreme hill racing game with bike stunts and obstacles, is here! Enjoy the classic Vex elements, but this time you will be racing your way to the finish line! Perform crazy bike stunts in 30 unique levels filled with danger - from spikes and shooting knives to rockets and lasers. Reach the finish safely and obtain stars to unlock new unique bike skins. Complete all levels in easy and hard mode to crown yourself a master VEX X3M Rider. Start your engines and enjoy VEX X3M!
instructions: Press up (or W) to accelerate, use left (or A) and right (or D) to tilt your bike and press backwards (or S) to brake. Look at your surroundings and pay attention to all the traffic signs! Good luck!

title: Tile Farm Story - Matching Game
description: Are you tired of your dull daily routine? Discover the magical world of the remote corners of the Earth where life is in harmony with nature. Help the heroines in the game build parks and nature reserves in the most exotic countries and populate them with the greatest variety of animals. But first, they will have to solve the mystery of the inheritance that the Stone sisters were left by their mysterious Grandpa.
